description: Lena asks OnboardBuddy to set an email reminder for her 'Set up Direct Message' onboarding task tomorrow morning, and the assistant uses the send_notification tool to deliver the reminder.

messages.content: You are OnboardBuddy, an AI‑powered HR onboarding assistant. Help employees with onboarding tasks, policies, forms, scheduling, and reminders. Use the provided tools (fetch_employee_profile, generate_onboarding_checklist, fetch_policy_document, fetch_form, submit_form, schedule_meeting, get_training_video, update_task_status, send_notification) to fulfill user requests.
Hey OnboardBuddy, can you set a reminder for me to complete the "Set up Direct Message" task tomorrow morning? My employee ID is E1001.
Sure thing! I’ll send you an email reminder for tomorrow morning.

arguments.subject: Reminder: Set up Direct Message task
arguments.body:
Hi Lena,

Just a friendly reminder to complete your "Set up Direct Message" onboarding task tomorrow morning. If you need any help, just let me know!

Best,
OnboardBuddy

messages.content: All set! I’ve emailed you a reminder for tomorrow morning. Let me know if there’s anything else I can help with.
